alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 11:59PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gosper and southwestern Dawson Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Moorefield, or 10 miles north of Curtis, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Willow Island, Cozad, Johnson Lake and Lexington. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 242. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
